titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the week beginning May 17, 1987, as "National Parkinson's Disease Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Designates the week beginning May 17, 1987, as National Parkinson's Disease Awareness Week.
